ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Collecting Bone Chips
ygData.msgSnippet: Neklutos I offfer 5pp per 20 which at level 35-50 mobs drop a few pp a kill so it shouldn t be that bad. I stock up on a minimum of 80 and then I m off hunting
ygData.messageBody:
Neklutos I offfer 5pp per 20 which at level 35-50 mobs drop a few pp a kill
so it shouldn't be that bad. I stock up on a minimum of 80 and then I'm off
hunting again.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Aazen1@... <Aazen1@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, April 09, 2000 5:38 PM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Collecting Bone Chips


>I have a question that I think will benefit every single person on this
list.
>As you all know, once our supply of bone chips runs low, we then often
times
>have to spend a large amount of platinum buying a fresh supply from younger
>players or spend several hours gathering them ourselves. In the hopes of
>making this burden easier on all of us, I come asking : Where do you go to
>collect your chips? I ask that anyone who knows of a good place to go when
>seeking bone chips shares it with this list. Any and all replies are
>appreciated.
>
>Walk in Darkness,
>Aazen Sy'Vex
>
>---------------------------------------------------------------------------
---
>----------------------------------------------
>"What about love?"
>"Overrated. Biochemically, no different than consuming mass quantities of
>chocolate."
>-The Devil's Advocate
